title:
Asymptotic expansions for the reciprocal Hardy-Littlewood logarithmic
  integrals
abstract:
Defining a family of recurrences, we generalize Comtet's formula for the
generating function of the enumeration of indecomposable permutations.
Consequently, we generalize Panaitopol's asymptotic expansion for the prime
counting function, obtaining asymptotic expansions salient to the first
Hardy-Littlewood conjecture.
